title: Poster, 1997-19-215, 1973
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in black upper left along top edge: Design: Laurence Bach   Printed at The Falcon Press
inscribed: Verso: Imprinted right center: direct mail information for Philadelphia College of Art Bulletin
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Poster and application form for PCA's PreCollege Program, 2 July - 3 August, 1973. A montage of photographically reproduced elements including paper clips, a roll of kodak film, a glass of soda, a hot dog, and a jar with brushes. At center in red "PreCollege Program". At left is an application form and at right three columns of text explaining requirements for entry.
